mapper.insert: insert into tbl_contents_review (Contents_ID, Member_ID, Contents_Review, Contents_Review_Time) values (#{contentsID}, #{memberID}, #{contentsReview}, now())
mapper.update: update tbl_contents_review set Contents_Review = #{contentsReview}, Contents_Review_Time = now() where Contents_Review_ID = #{contentsReviewID}
mapper.select: select Member_ID memberID, Contents_Review_ID contentsReviewID, Contents_Review contentsReview, Contents_Review_Time contentsReviewTime from tbl_contents_review where Contents_ID = #{contentsID} order by Contents_Review_ID desc limit #{cri.startNum}, #{cri.contentsPerPage}
select count(Contents_ID) from tbl_contents_review where Contents_ID = #{contentsID}
select Contents_ID from tbl_contents_review where Contents_Review_ID = #{contentsReviewID}
select Review_Picture_Name from tbl_review_attachment where Contents_Review_ID = #{reviewID}
